column5: Does anyone know of a source for good maps for Lac Seul and/or Lake St. Joseph? I have fished southern Lac Seul for years and have just discovered Lake St. Joseph. The usual maps that I have found are pretty week on detail. I'm looking for maps that would help me pinpoint "fishy" features like incoming streams. Any suggestions?

The most detailed maps that I have seen on Lake St. Joseph are from the MNR. Only problem is they are HUGE, which makes them difficult to carry in the boat. We got them a few years ago, but have gone back to the ones provided by the camp. Good Luck. Fred
